title: The Diver in the Forest
front: A man is found dead in the middle of a burnt forest. He is wearing a full wet suit, flippers, and a scuba tank.
back: The man was diving in the ocean near the coast. A massive forest fire was raging nearby. A firefighting plane scooped up a load of water from the ocean to dump on the fire. The diver was accidentally scooped up along with the water and dropped from a great height onto the burning forest.

title: The Light Switch
front: A man turned off the light and went to sleep. The next morning, he woke up, looked out the window, saw tremendous devastation.
back: The man was a lighthouse keeper. By turning off the light before going to sleep during a storm, he caused several ships to crash into the coast. He saw the wreckage in the sea the next morning.

title: The High Card
front: Four men sat around a table in a metal room. One man drew the highest card, froze, and passed away seconds later.
back: The four men were the crew of a military submarine that had lost power and was running out of oxygen. They realized there was only enough air left for three of them to survive until rescue arrived. They drew cards to decide who would sacrifice themselves to save the others. The man with the high card "won" the draw and shot himself to stop consuming oxygen.

title: Albatross Soup
front: A sailor walks into a seaside restaurant and orders albatross soup. He takes one sip, pulls out a gun, and shoots himself.
back: Years ago, the sailor was shipwrecked on a desert island with two other crewmates and his wife. His wife died, and the crewmates fed him "albatross soup" to keep him alive. When he finally returned to civilization and tasted real albatross soup, he realized the taste was completely different. He instantly understood that he hadn't eaten albatross on the island. Instead, he had eaten his dead wife.

title: The Expensive Photo
front: A woman took a photograph of a beautiful sunset over the ocean. Because she took the photo, she died moments later.
back: The woman was on an ocean cruise in an area known for piracy. The passengers had been explicitly instructed to turn off all flash photography at dusk so as not to alert pirates to their location. She forgot to disable her automatic flash. The bright flash drew the attention of nearby pirates, who approached the ship and opened fire. She was shot during the attack.

title: The Calm Waters
front: A man was drifting on a raft. The water was perfectly calm and flat. The man dipped his hand into the water to cool off, screamed, and pulled back a skeletal hand.
back: The man was stranded on the Amazon River. He was unknowingly drifting over a school of piranhas. When the man dipped his hand in the water, the piranhas stripped the flesh from it almost instantly.

title: The Open Window
front: A man opened a window to get some fresh air because it was hot. Because he did this, 60 people died.
back: The man was a new cook aboard a submarine. The cook, feeling overheated in the kitchen, opened a small supply hatch without authorization when the submarine was surfaced. The captain, unaware of this, received a radar warning and ordered an emergency crash dive. The open hatch allowed the submarine to flood with water before it could be sealed, sinking the vessel and drowning the 60-person crew on board.
